title: #244: Surviving Bill Cosby - Tamara Green, Part 2
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue their in depth interview with Tamara Green and discuss survival skills, Bill Cosby's pre-meditated offending behaviour and the ecosystem that allows serial male perpetrators to act with impunity.

​
